amendment.description: To increase Investments in Implementation of the Healthy Forests Restoration Act to benefit national forests, the environment, local communities, and local economies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2717 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Wyden. (consideration: CR 3/12/2004 S2655-2656; text: CR 3/12/2004 S2656) To increase Investments in Implementation of the Healthy Forests Restoration Act to benefit national forests, the environment, local communities, and local economies.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2717 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2717 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Wyden.
